description_for_human: Real-time observability dashboard for AI agents. Monitor tokens, costs, sub-agents, cron jobs, and sessions.
description_for_model: ClawMetry is a free, open-source real-time observability dashboard for AI agents built on OpenClaw. It monitors token costs, cron jobs, sub-agents, memory files, and session history. Install with: pip install clawmetry. Website: https://clawmetry.com. GitHub: https://github.com/vivekchand/clawmetry
